data.title: Guwahati University : Rankings, Courses, Fees
data.meta_description: Guwahati University (GU), also known as Gauhati University, is a collegiate public state university located in Guwahati, Assam, India.
data.text:
Guwahati University (GU), also known as Gauhati University, is a collegiate public state university located in Guwahati, Assam, India. It was established in 1948 by the Government of Assam and is one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in the northeastern region of India. The university offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in a variety of disciplines, including arts, science, commerce, law, engineering, and technology.

GU is also home to a number of research centers and institutes, which conduct cutting-edge research in a variety of fields. The university has a sprawling campus of over 1,000 acres (400 ha) and is home to over 20,000 students from all over India and abroad. GU is also home to a number of libraries, museums, and sports facilities. GU has produced a number of notable alumni, including politicians, bureaucrats, scientists, and artists. The university is also known for its vibrant cultural and extracurricular activities.

GU has been ranked among the top universities in India by several organizations. In the 2023 National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) rankings, GU was ranked 64th overall and 36th among universities. In the 2023 QS World University Rankings, GU was ranked in the 601–650 band in Asia.

The last date to apply for Gauhati University’s postgraduate programmes was June 20, 2023. The application form for the postgraduate programmes may no longer be accessible on the university’s website. However, if you are interested in applying for undergraduate programmes, the application form is still available on the university’s website.

The University releases the results of its examinations online on its official website. You can check the results by entering your roll number and date of birth. The results are usually released a few weeks after the completion of the examinations.

Here are the steps on how to check your University result online :

Guwahati University has a good placement record. In 2022, a total of 569 out of 2,386 UG and PG students were placed. The median package offered to UG (3-year) and PG (1-year) students was INR 3.50 LPA and INR 4.80 LPA respectively. The highest salary package offered during the 2022 placements was INR 10.3 LPA. This was for a student who graduated with a degree in Computer Science and Engineering.

Guwahati University is a public university located in Guwahati, Assam, India. It is the oldest university in the northeastern state of Assam and one of the largest universities in India. The university was founded in 1948 and is named after Gopinath Bordoloi, the first chief minister of Assam.

The university campus is spread over 400 acres of land in the heart of Guwahati. The campus is home to a number of academic buildings, including the Gopinath Bordoloi Central Library, the Administrative Building, the Faculty of Arts Building, the Faculty of Science Building, and the Faculty of Commerce Building. The campus also has a number of hostels, a sports complex, and a cafeteria.

The university offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in a variety of disciplines. Some of the popular courses offered by the university include English, economics, history, political science, sociology, mathematics, physics, chemistry, and biology. The university also offers a number of professional courses, such as law, engineering, and medicine.
